StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>My eye always ends up wandering toward
ruins or sky islands...
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Looks like there's something in those
ruins. It's gnawing at me...<sp:5:1:0>
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Our regular clothing stayed dry when we
had to wear our underpants uniforms.<sp:5:0:0>
Not a good look, though, was it?
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Did you know <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff> isn't gems
and such? It's <clr:0000>fashionable clothes<clr:ffff> that
have a legendary look.
I hear Misko hid a piece in a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> nearby.
Personally, I suspect it might be in the
cliffs of the <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Getting clothes wet ruins their fit.<sp:5:0:0> Rain
really is the bane of fashion.

Maybe our underpants outfits that we
formerly wore would endure this weather
far better.
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Happy_00>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> It's you! The master of underpants
excellence.<sp:5:0:0> The one who showed us all
how to achieve more, wearing less.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Thanks for your help with all that. What?<sp:5:0:0>
My new outfit?<sp:0:4:0>I've always been a stylish personâ€”a
real cutting-edge sort, not to toot my
own horn.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I joined the Zonai Survey Team purely
because I thought their outfit was so
unfashionable that it'd BE fashionable.
But that whole underpants debacle
made me realize I'm not cut out to be
a surveyor of ruins.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>See? I have reinvented myself yet again.
Unfashionable fashion is so last year
anyway. True chic never goes out of style.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Now, I'm looking for a <clr:0000>certain thing <clr:ffff>near
here that I think would make quite a
fashion statement. So I hope.
I'm also the sole person looking for it,
and that makes me...<sp:5:1:0>the one and only
member of the Fashion Survey Team!
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, if it isn't the purveyor of
underpants excellence!

Incredible that Hyrule is so full of paths,
yet ours continue to cross.

Ah, the fashionable life truly is a
rewarding one!
Greeting_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>At least, that's what I'd like to
tell myself...
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>A ruin big enough to crush a bridge...
Which <clr:0000>sky island <clr:ffff>could it've fallen from?

I have a feeling that sky island might hold
the key to unlocking some of our history's
greatest mysteries...
Greeting_02:
Now, above all else, <sp:5:0:0>I seek the <clr:0000>treasures<clr:ffff>
hidden across Hyrule by the fashion
pioneer<clr:0000> Misko<clr:ffff>!
StartPoint_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Sad_01>No, no, no! No more thinking about ruins!


I walked all the way to the <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>
to find legendarily fashionable clothes!
I'm here for <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>, not history!
I intend to use my Zonai Survey Team
skills to find those clothes, and
nothing else!
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There should be a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> near here where
<clr:0000>treasure<clr:ffff> is hidden. <sp:5:1:0>Personally, I believe
it's in the cliffs of the <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>.
GoalPoint_01:
Hmm...<sp:5:1:0> I don't know what it is, but
something about those ruins intrigues me.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Some bandits take jewels, but <clr:0000>Misko <clr:ffff>took
highly fashionable clothes! One piece of
their treasure is hidden in a <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>nearby.
I'm really curious, but I can't see the
<clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>. Please don't tell me it's at the top
of the cliff.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I'm certain the <clr:0000>treasure<clr:ffff> is in a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>
around here, <sp:5:0:0>but surely it can't be at
the top of the cliff!
GoalPoint_02:
Those ruins have something inside of
them.<sp:5:0:0> Might it be...<sp:5:1:0>a monster?
